EmailTemplate.name: Internet and phones down
EmailTemplate.subject: Internet and Phones Down
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The International School of Moscow Part of The British Schools Group
Dear Parents,
Unfortunately our internet connection and phone lines are down. We have redirected the phone lines to mobile phones so you will still be able to reach us.
The problem should be solved within a few hours.
Regards,
Administration Team The International School of Moscow World Class Education
__________________________________________________________ Member of The British School Group- University of Cambridge Examination Centre - Affiliate Member of the Conference of British International Schools - Licensed by the Russian Ministry of Education
